main.locale: You can enter the name of the city in English or Ukrainian in the search form
main.info: In the case of a successful request to the server, you will receive information on the current weather
main.infoThreeHours: Weather information for every next three hours will also be displayed
main.infoNextFiveDays: For convenience, additional slides with the weather for the next five days have been implemented
main.noResults: No cities were found for your request, try again
